projects.workProcess: How I organized my work process

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description1: I look forward to new challenges and exciting projects. As a web developer, I bring fresh ideas and technical know-how to your team.
contact.description2: Feel free to contact me for job offers, project inquiries or collaboration opportunities.
contact.name: Your Name
contact.privacyText: and agree to the processing of my data.
contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: This privacy policy explains how your personal data is collected, used, and protected when you use this portfolio website and contact form.
privacy.dataCollectionText: When you use the contact form, the following data is collected:
privacy.dataCollectionPurpose: This data is collected solely for the purpose of responding to your inquiry.
privacy.dataUsageText: Your personal data will only be used to:
privacy.dataUsage2: Communicate regarding potential job opportunities or collaborations
privacy.dataUsageNote: Your data will not be shared with third parties or used for marketing purposes.
privacy.dataStorageText: Your data is stored securely and will be deleted after the purpose of communication has been fulfilled, unless legal retention periods require otherwise.
privacy.yourRightsText: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy.right1: Right to access your personal data
privacy.right2: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
privacy.right3: Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
privacy.contactText: For any questions or requests regarding your personal data, please contact:
